artist: Count Anton-Maria Zanetti the Elder; After Raphael Sanzio
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: man reclining on a bed with a youth facing him in the foreground; woman and youth to the R under an arch
marks:
Signature, Date signed in block, upper right: [Ex Raph Vrbinat]
d
medium: Chiaroscuro woodcut from three color block and key block
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Isaac Blessing Esau
